s1 =

    0.1542    0.9879   -0.0167
   -0.8799    0.1450    0.4525
    0.4494   -0.0551    0.8916

>> s2 = [-0.075535 0.993820 0.081338;
-0.899252 -0.103139 0.425097;
0.430859 -0.041033 0.901486]

s2 =

   -0.0755    0.9938    0.0813
   -0.8993   -0.1031    0.4251
    0.4309   -0.0410    0.9015

>> s = s1 * inv(s2)

s =

    0.9688   -0.2477    0.0108
    0.2474    0.9687    0.0229
   -0.0162   -0.0194    0.9997

>> c = [0.97770917, -0.10588817, 0.18130782;
 0.1045161, 0.99437565, 0.017132953;
 -0.18210223, 0.0021985653, 0.98327714]

c =

    0.9777   -0.1059    0.1813
    0.1045    0.9944    0.0171
   -0.1821    0.0022    0.9833

>> r = vrrotmat2vec(s)

r =

   -0.0850    0.0543    0.9947    0.2515

>> r = vrrotmat2vec(c)

r =

   -0.0355    0.8649    0.5007    0.2117
